model.title: Model
model.description: Choose the model you want to use.

hostUrl.title: Host Base URL
hostUrl.description: Provide the base URL for your private OpenAI API-compatible server.

hideOnClickOutside.title: Hide SpotLLM Window When Clicking Outside
hideOnClickOutside.description: Automatically hide the SpotLLM window when you click outside it.

autoCopy.title: Auto Copy Before Launching SpotLLM Window
autoCopy.description: Automatically copy the selected text (Ctrl/Cmd + C) before opening the SpotLLM window using the hotkey.

hotkey.title: SpotLLM Window Hotkey
hotkey.description: Set a hotkey combination to open the SpotLLM window.

dialog.title: Press a Hotkey Combination
dialog.message: Press at least two keys simultaneously. Press ESC to cancel.

shortcut.title: Shortcut
shortcut.description: Enter the shortcut that the app will recognize. Users can invoke this template by typing "/" followed by the shortcut.

name.title: Template Name
name.description: Enter a name for the template. Only letters, numbers, and underscores (_) are allowed.

hotkey.title: Template Hotkey
hotkey.description: Assign a hotkey combination for this template.

responseKey.title: Response Key
responseKey.description: Specify the key to use if expecting a JSON response.

content.title: Template
content.description:
Use Markdown to define the template. The following placeholders will be replaced with actual content when the template is invoked:
{content}: User input after the shortcut string.
{clipboard}: Clipboard content.
{date}: Today's date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
{time}: Current time in HH:MM:SS format.
content.placeholder: Enter your template in Markdown format

notifications.missingFields: One or more required fields are missing: Shortcut, Name, Template.

confirmDelete.title: Delete Template
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this template?

input.placeholder: Press Enter to submit or Shift+Enter for a new line.
